name: Stung by OWASP? Chatting with the creator of the most popular web app scanner (Ep. 570)
summary: Simon Bennetts, founder and project lead of OWASP ZAP, joins the home team to talk about how he came to create the worldâ€™s most-used web app scanner, why open-source projects need long-term contributors, and how recent AI advancements could introduce new security vulnerabilities.
